com.qozix.tileview.widgets

Class ZoomPanLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewGroup
      • com.qozix.tileview.widgets.ZoomPanLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TouchUpGestureDetector.OnTouchUpListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TileView

    public class ZoomPanLayout
extends ViewGroup
implements TouchUpGestureDetector.OnTouchUpListener
    ZoomPanLayout extends ViewGroup to provide support for scrolling and zooming. Fling, drag, pinch and double-tap events are supported natively. Children of ZoomPanLayout are laid out to the sizes provided by setSize, and will always be positioned at 0,0.

      • setShouldScaleToFit

        public void setShouldScaleToFit(boolean shouldScaleToFit)
        Determines whether the ZoomPanLayout should limit it's minimum scale to no less than what would be required to fill it's container.
        Parameters:
        shouldScaleToFit - True to limit minimum scale, false to allow arbitrary minimum scale.

      • setScaleLimits

        public void setScaleLimits(float min,
                  float max)
        Set minimum and maximum mScale values for this ZoomPanLayout. Note that if shouldScaleToFit is set to true, the minimum value set here will be ignored Default values are 0 and 1.
        Parameters:
        min - Minimum scale the ZoomPanLayout should accept.
        max - Maximum scale the ZoomPanLayout should accept.

        Parameters:
        width - Width of the underlying image, not the view or viewport.
        height - Height of the underlying image, not the view or viewport.

      • smoothScaleFromFocalPoint

        public void smoothScaleFromFocalPoint(int focusX,
                             int focusY,
                             float scale)
        Animates the ZoomPanLayout to the scale provided, while maintaining position determined by the focal point provided.
        Parameters:
        focusX - The horizontal focal point to maintain, relative to the screen (as supplied by MotionEvent.getX).
        focusY - The vertical focal point to maintain, relative to the screen (as supplied by MotionEvent.getY).
        scale - The final scale value the ZoomPanLayout should animate to.
